channel.title: TOR:AC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:AC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Air Canada Cabin Crew Union Resoundingly Rejects Pay Package
item.description: Almost all of Air Canada’s more than 10,000 flight attendants voted to reject the company’s contract offer, extending a labor dispute that led to a brief shutdown last month.

item.title: Air Canada Cabin Crew Union Resoundingly Rejects Pay Package
item.description: Almost all of Air Canada’s more than 10,000 flight attendants voted to reject the company’s contract offer, extending a labor dispute that led to a brief shutdown last month.

item.title: Air Canada Warns of Chaos as Labor Impasse Cancels Flights
item.description: Air Canada said it remains available to continue negotiations with its flight attendants as it winds down operations ahead of a potential labor disruption.

item.title: Air Canada Warns of Chaos as Labor Impasse Cancels Flights
item.description: Air Canada said it remains available to continue negotiations with its flight attendants as it winds down operations ahead of a potential labor disruption.

item.title: Air Canada Flight Attendants Plan to Strike from Aug. 16
item.description: Air Canada’s flight attendants said they plan to strike from August 16, after their union and the airline failed to reach an agreement during a conciliation process that ended last month.

item.title: Air Canada Flight Attendants Plan to Strike from Aug. 16
item.description: Air Canada’s flight attendants said they plan to strike from August 16, after their union and the airline failed to reach an agreement during a conciliation process that ended last month.

item.title: Air Canada’s Flight Attendants Plan to Strike from Saturday
item.description: Air Canada’s more than 10,500 flight attendants said they’ll strike beginning Saturday if a deal isn’t reached. The airline said it’s gradually suspending flights as a result.

item.title: Air Canada’s Flight Attendants Plan to Strike from Saturday
item.description: Air Canada’s more than 10,500 flight attendants said they’ll strike beginning Saturday if a deal isn’t reached. The airline said it’s gradually suspending flights as a result.
